list.name: Time region for panel Docker Container CPU Usage
Time region for panel Docker Container CPU Usage
Time region for panel Docker Container CPU Usage

targets.query: SELECT last("uptime") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_percent") FROM "docker_container_cpu" WHERE ("docker.group" =~ /^()$/ AND "host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "container_name" fill(none)
SELECT last("n_cpus") FROM "docker" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT last("n_images") FROM "docker" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT distinct("usage_idle") *-1+100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" = 'cpu1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT distinct("usage_idle") *-1+100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" = 'cpu2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT distinct("usage_idle") *-1+100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" = 'cpu2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT distinct("usage_idle") *-1+100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" = 'cpu2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT distinct("usage_idle") *-1+100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" = 'cpu2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT distinct("usage_idle") *-1+100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" = 'cpu2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean(total) as total, mean(used) as used, mean(cached) as cached, mean(free) as free, mean(buffered) as buffered  FROM "mem" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc

SELECT mean(usage_user) as "user", mean(usage_system) as "system", mean(usage_softirq) as "softirq", mean(usage_steal) as "steal", mean(usage_nice) as "nice", mean(usage_irq) as "irq", mean(usage_iowait) as "iowait", mean(usage_guest) as "guest", mean(usage_guest_nice) as "guest_nice"  FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ and cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_recv), 1s) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /$netif/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_sent), 1s) as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /$netif/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(processes_forked),1s) as forks FROM "kernel" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host fill(null)
SELECT mean(load1) as short,mean(load5) as medium,mean(load15) as long FROM "system" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * ORDER BY asc
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(context_switches),1s)as "context switches"  FROM "kernel" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc

list.label: Server
list.name: server
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=host

list.label: Mountpoint
list.name: mountpoint
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "disk" WITH KEY = "path" WHERE host =~ /$server/

list.label: CPU
list.name: cpu
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu" WITH KEY = "cpu" WHERE host =~ /$server/

list.label: Disk
list.name: disk
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "diskio" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE host =~ /$server/

list.label: Network interface
list.name: netif
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE host =~ /$server/
